column4: I need some help using mysql on ubuntu server edition - not sure how to get to the promt, giving me errors such as "can't use socket"
what's the command to do so?
edit /etc/mysql/my.conf, put a # infront of the line containing bind-address           = 127.0.0.1
there was a misinterpretation on my side: please have a look into the logs on the server (in /var/log/mysql)
I looked in the logs - there's nothing there
nothing? is the directory not there? is it empty? are the files empty?
what am i looking for exactly
possible - i have barely touched it
furythor - I'm trying to install phpbb3 - it still doesn't detect a database
I'm almost done - would rather not do that
